backend/main.mo: Defines types and an actor that stores crafting games and catalog data, providing query methods for games, items, search, categories, and update status.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that returns the previous actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping one publish-to-production feature to its related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files, used for build planning or analysis tooling.
frontend/docs/publish-to-production.md: Documentation outlining the steps and checks required to promote the current draft build to production without rebuilding.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with deep-link restoration logic and script bootstrap for the SPA.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that captures the requested path, stores it, and redirects to the root for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring routes, preflight checks, query client, layout, and deep-link restoration.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component showing an empty-state message with optional title, description, and icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing attribution, copyright, and a link to diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, title, and a home-navigation button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actors based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductionPrefligh: Runs one-time backend connectivity checks on load and stores structured results in the diagnostics store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching games, catalog data, items, and update statuses through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for a parchment-style light and dark UI with subtle textures.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/collectFron: Collects runtime, environment, build, and preflight diagnostics into a structured object for reporting or copying.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Renders a diagnostics UI showing environment info and preflight results, with clipboard copy support and fallback selection mode.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed game information, including crafting data and item filtering by category or search term.
frontend/src/pages/GameSearchPage.tsx: Provides a searchable game library view with a hero banner and dynamic filtering of catalog games.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed info for a specific item, including category, required materials, and stats, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/state/preflightDiagnosticsS: Zustand store managing preflight diagnostics state, including running, skipped, and completed statuses.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, schema version, features, and configuration for build planning.
